website_summaries.verdict: A nice and inexpensive little egg poacher pan that does double duty as an 10-inch skillet.
pros: A nice size for making a small number of poached eggs
The knobs on these poacher cups are convenient as is the knob in the middle of the tray used for removing the eggs when they are done cooking
Non-stick cups for cooking the eggs
cons: If the handles come off of the cups, they cannot be easily reattached

customer_reviews.title: The cups make the poach
customer_reviews.text: Ive used poachers for the last 30 years, without a doubt the key is the cups the egg sits in. A true poacher should heat the egg from the sides never from just the bottom, this allows a solid white to form while keeping the yolk liquid. Most poachers cook from the bottom up which leads to an over cooked egg. This poacher is the best one I’ve used in a long time, great value highly satisfied, if you love poached eggs this is a must, worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The metal insert that holds the egg cups is poorly made. When washing or handling the circles and outside edge are razor sharp and my husband got a very deep cut on his finger. The manufacturer should mill this area so it is not sharp. I can't imagine they do not know about this flaw and if so shame on them. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously sharp!
customer_reviews.text: So when this first arrived I was super excited. It's heavy and durable feeling. It cooked the eggs perfectly too. But when I went to wash the inside tray, it cut my finger so deep! The outer edges of the inner tray and the edges of the circles where the egg trays sit in are incredibly sharp! As sharp as a knife. They were not filed or finished on the edges. I'm considering returning because I'm afraid if one of my kids washes it, we will have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a GOOD egg poacher...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this. It has nice weight and is sturdy. The cups are deep enough for extra large eggs. The flat bottom works very good on our flat cook top. What I do like most, is that the eggs just slide/pour out when finished. No more tedious scrubbing of the egg cups after cooking. I use a little butter in the cups before I put the eggs in. As the water starts to boil a little, I turn the heat down to a slow boil, then place the cups in the pan and go about 4 1/2 minutes for a soft center. probably a minute more for a firm yolk.
customer_reviews.author: YaquinaHead

customer_reviews.title: Viola perfectly poached.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect poached eggs. Bring water to a steady simmer, drop up to 1 jumbo egg into each pod, set timer for 5 minutes. Viola done, they slide out very easy from this cooking pan.
customer_reviews.author: D Green

customer_reviews.title: Eggs don't stick
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality egg poaching set. The pan is heavy duty, the cups are nice and deep and I love the glass lid. I had my first egg this morning and it came out perfectly. I used a very small amount of butter in the cup and had absolutely no problem with the egg sticking.Clean up was easy. I've tried the silicon ones before and they ended up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: S McD

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, sharp edges and nonstick it isn't
customer_reviews.text: As noted by other reviewers, the egg cup insert is dangerously sharp. I ended up with three cuts cleaning the insert. The holes are merely stamped out without any edge treatment. In addition, after poaching the eggs, i found I had to scrub the egg holders as the cooked residue did not want to release. This after using the first time. So much for non-stick. I'm returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: dogafterdarkdog

customer_reviews.title: Metal has sharp edges and cuts you.
customer_reviews.text: It is fine for poaching eggs, however when I wash it, the metal edges of the eggs cup holder cuts my hands terribly!! Wish I had used it sooner. DO NOT BUY THIS. Find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D

customer_reviews.title: 4 egg poacher pan set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The day I received it, I washed it and used it right away. In about 4 minutes you have soft poached eggs and in 5 to 6 minutes they are hard yoke poached eggs. They slide right out of the little cup onto your plate. I don't even have to use the little utensil that comes with it. This is the best egg poacher I have ever owned. And clean up is a breeze. I hand wash it as I do with all my pots and pans. Nothing sticks so clean up is very easy. I am going to order one for my sister in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had this egg poacher for just a few months and it is falling apart. The screw handles on the cups get lose and stripped, rendering it useless. We had our old poacher for a decade. This one is junk and won't last six months. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: JC2

customer_reviews.title: Nice Replacement for an Ancient Egg Poacher
customer_reviews.text: This poacher is simple, and seems pretty good quality. The glass lid fits well, and the eggs cook nice and evenly. It's easy to pick up the egg cups with a standard pair of tongs, and the eggs slide right out (no need for the included little spatula.) The pan itself, when the insert that holds the cups is removed, seems like it would double as a nice reduction pan or something similar. Our old (as in early 1900's) alumin-ish one, the cups barely held an extra large egg where these have no problem. It's nice and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CoolBoomer

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  Handle will burn you!
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews describing sharp edges of the cup holder tray but I did not find that to be an issue. I was ready to round them off with a diamond file so it was not an issue for me. What IS an issue is the fact that the handle and grip have ZERO insulation against transferred heat. ZERO. I've been around a while so I know not to just take a firm grip for the first time without testing. Lucky me. The handle was as hot as the side of the poacher. It does poach eggs perfectly but if you don't want to worry about burning your hand then buy an insulating slip cover for the handle.
customer_reviews.author: jtlancer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This traditional egg poaching pan is well designed with good materials. With proper care, should last a lifetime. Sure there are electric egg cookers, but sometimes the old traditional way is the best way. I've had fancy egg cookers die on me, all that automation doesn't last, and sooner or later your looking for another one. Not this product. No circuitry, no moving parts, just put in water, figure out the timing and get perfect poached eggs the way you like them. After several egg cookers, I'm going retro with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lancelot T. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the perfectly poached egg
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times I tried to make traditional poached eggs in water, they never came out right. Always turned into an ugly mess. I even studied youtube video after youtube video on how to poach an egg, still a complete fail. Using this pan, they came out beautiful and perfectly cooked. So easy to use, I can even do it now.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great egg poacher!
customer_reviews.text: I like to make Eggs Benedict.........and this is the perfect device to help make poached eggs. You simply simmer the water in the main pan, and then warm the egg cups in the slots, put a little oil in the cups (along with herbs, salt, pepper, grated cheese, etc), crack your egg, and put the contents in the cup. Put the cover on (very important), and I like to cook them for 3.5 minutes. Comes out perfect each time......a nicely domed poached egg, with slightly runny center. Highly recommend this product! PS: there was a concern about sharp edges......I have Not found this to be the case. It is well made, with no sharp edges here.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Kleinpell

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality poacher.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the heavy duty pan and teflon coated egg cups. This is well worth the price. The instructions take way too long to cook if you use low heat. I bring the water to a boil and then add the cups with eggs insude. I turn the electric range dial down to 2 and they cook fast and the yokes are runny as I prefer them. If you turn it down to LOW as suggested it takes 7-8 minutes to cook vs. 2-3 at my range number 2 setting. I jiggle the pan every so often to make sure the eggs are still runny and not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Ridinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eggs every time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the poacher because my daughter loves eggs Benedict. It’s a nice, well-made, heavy pan, and the egg cups are truly nonstick. I do butter them a little for flavor. We like our eggs with pretty firm yolks, so I cook them for five and a half minutes. They come out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Carmenati

customer_reviews.title: Love my new pan
customer_reviews.text: This is my first and only poaching pan. I was getting to the point where I didn't want to eat fried eggs, something my husband has to have almost daily. I didn't care for how he cooks them. I had only had poached eggs when ordered eggs benedict in restaurants a few times. After reading about how to make poached eggs without a pan, I decided on a whim to get this pan. It is VERY easy to get perfect poached eggs. Pan is easy to clean and is a good quality. I REALLY like it and now I enjoy poached eggs quite often.
customer_reviews.author: kimannchi

customer_reviews.title: Easy Poached Eggs are Possible!
customer_reviews.text: I had some of the silicone molds that floated in water, but they were hard to clean and hard to put into the water without spilling the egg. This pan is great! I do put pan spray in the egg cups to make sure they don't stick, but they clean up easily. I've made poached eggs several times since getting this and the clean up is just to put the little egg cups in the dishwasher and pour the water out of the pan. Makes great poached eggs very easily!
customer_reviews.author: commongoldgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: Not Impressed with this poacher pan at all. Pain on the neck to clean. Problem writer off just putting eggs in water
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you like tall and narrow eggs...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for eggs Benedict style eggs (my old egg cooker simply died after over two decades of faithful service). This one looks nice and is fairly easy to use. Problem is the diameter of the cups - squeezing four cups into a six inch diameter tray is the cause. Just try to put one of the inch and half tall cooked eggs onto an english muffin!! Bottom line, I HART it and have already thrown it away and replaced it. Nicely made and easy to clean do not necessarily make a "good" egg cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poached eggs
customer_reviews.text: Could not be easier to use. Nice handle, stainless steel. Glass lid to monitor the eggs. 4 Teflon coated egg cups that are easy to remove. Also included is a small spatula to ease the eggs out of the cups. I spray the cups lightly with cooking oil. Clean up is in 30 seconds. Eggs only take 4 minutes to cook. Serve over toast, and garnish to you liking. Your breakfast has just been enhanced.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had an egg poaching pan in many years. The last one I had was made out of aluminum as thin as a soda pop can. This one is made out of very heavy gauge metal. I think you could drop it off of a rooftop and it would not dent. My 4 minute poached eggs came slid out with no problem. The only con is the shape of the cup. Too narrow and too deep, so your poached egg comes out sort of like a muffin. Kind of hard to eat between slices of toast.
customer_reviews.author: LeeMt

customer_reviews.title: A Great Egg Poacher
customer_reviews.text: This pan is the whole deal. We had a purchased different one on Amazon about a year ago that had several naggy problems. This one is nicely balanced, is easy to use cooks the eggs very nicely. We can have 2 less cooked and 2 more cooked without a whole lot of fuss. It cleans up easily as well. I think it is the best one we have ever had in our 50+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Makes Instagram Worthy Eggs
customer_reviews.text: I started making poached eggs for my family recently and my dad appreciated that so much he purchased this pan for me to make my life easier. I love the concept of it! All parts have survived the dishwasher. I would definitely recommend using a non stick spray prior to placing the eggs in the cups because the included spatula can only do so much. It would also be really helpful if the handles to remove the cups were taller, perhaps shaped like a loop instead of a knob—they get warm and oven mitts are bulky. I screen strained the raw eggs to remove the excess white prior to placing them in the cups, cook time accurate.
customer_reviews.author: charles i. ditto

customer_reviews.title: FALLS APART FAST.
customer_reviews.text: It works great BUT the knobs / handles / fittings what ever yo want to call them deteriorate after a few uses. They become loose from the heat and they do not hold tight after being tightened. Im going to end up buying a plastic one for the microwave because I eat eggs almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Abdon Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!  An egg poacher That works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried countless other options, the microwave ones, the plastic ones you put in water, and even an instant pot one. I finally broke down and just bought this pan. It is worth the extra storage space. It is absolutely fantastic! The eggs don’t stick, they’re not under water when I pull them out and it is easy to clean. I like my yokes a little hard, and this poaches my eggs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Life and Laughter

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an egg poacher and glad I ordered this. The handle is very sturdy and the knob on glass top is a good size to hold with a hot pad. Eggs have cooked well, put some PAM in the cups, and they come out nicely cooked. Have used the spatula you included with this order but the eggs have come out easily on their own. You do have to use a hot pad or kitchen towel when handling the egg cup handle knob.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Teflon cups make eggs stick like a bandit.
customer_reviews.text: Base pan and top are great and well made. Tray fits well and is easy to clean. Teflon cups are terrible. Handles in bad position. The teflon cups are worthless. Eggs stick to the cups despite the coating and are a pain to clean up. I liked the old aluminum egg poachers with easy egg removal and cleaning. I would have expected a better quality. Somewhat of a dissappointment. If you don’t have an induction cook top, I’d recommend aluminum and not this set..
customer_reviews.author: GRK_Astronomer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible construction. After 2-3 uses the screws on the handles come off making it impossible to remove the tray/cups. Happened to 2 cups and the tray so wasn't a one-off. Junk product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: 26 yr old son uses often!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars though I don't use it. It was purchased for the house as my mother and youngest son make poached eggs & needed a new pot. I explained the need to watch when cleaning. But I haven't heard of any cleaning problems, or that they don't like it. I do know it is used at least 4 times a week since it came, breakfast, lunch and sometimes dinner! It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: nanny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: After trying every method known to woman or man for consistently good results for poaching eggs, and not getting those results, I ordered this pan. It is absolutely perfect! I put a little non-stick spray in each cup, follow the instructions on the box, and in three or three-and-a-bit minutes I've got beautiful poached eggs. I like the fact that the cups are non-stick and I really like that fact that the lid is glass so I can see exactly how the eggs are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Appel

customer_reviews.title: As beautiful as it is efficient.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous piece. Very sturdy and shiny and expensive looking! The only problem I have had are hard water spots but cleaning with a small amount of vinegar takes care of those. Oh yes, and it makes perfect poached eggs every time. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Deerocks56

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan but small deep egg dishes
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use and it’s easy to clean up. I did not like the size of the cups, they’re too deep. I would have preferred they were more shallow and larger around. I use the pan to prepare poached eggs for eggs Benedict. The cups do not create an egg large enough to cover the English muffin the way I would prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Hershel M.

customer_reviews.title: Do better research
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp edges on bottom of cup rack and cup edges. Also holds water in between handle and glass lid. If I had to purchase another one it wouldn’t be this particular one since I don’t like cuts on my hands
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Ok, it works...
customer_reviews.text: ...but there are a lot of pieces, and steps involved to get yourself some poached eggs. The non-stick cups DO stick, so you have to add oil/butter, and lots of us enjoy egg poached because that is not necessary. Also, it takes about twice as long as the good old-fashioned way of poaching an egg. So, $26 plus five additional pieces to deal with, but you get to do things the "new" way. I'll stick to the old way and return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Canny shopper

customer_reviews.title: So quick and easy and yummy
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this growing up and brought it home with me when we cleaned out the folks house. But it was aluminum so didn't like using it. This is a great upgrade on a wonderful cooker. My grandson loves those Jimmy Dean breakfast sandwiches and this helps make them myself. It is easy to make really soft eggs or hard ones. Just take out the one before the other and everyone is happy 😉. Be careful when removing, though, the steam is hot. Easy clean up as well. You won't regret getting this fun way to make eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Bagaof8

customer_reviews.title: A high quality product at a really good valued price!
customer_reviews.text: I started out looking at egg poacher pans for under $20, because that's what I've had before. You should absolutely spend the extra $10 and get this one! A cup of water in the pan heats in 1 minute, then 4 minutes cook-time to perfect poached eggs (med-low heat). Cooking spray the cups, add salt/pepper, and a large egg fits with plenty of room to spare. Other reviews mentioned sharp edges on the cup-holder tray ... yes, they are, but I haven't had any difficulty. Congrats to Modern Innovations for such a fine item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Since receiving this item (earlier than projected) I have used it three times, and the eggs were great! I use a light coating of butter in the cups, and have had no sticking. The cups will hold graded XL eggs with room to spare. Based on other reviews, I was careful about sharp edges, but found none. Cleaning is routine. Works just fine with induction stove top. Glass lid makes it very easy to monitor "readiness." So, so far, so good...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blum

customer_reviews.title: Cooking times vary based on desired doneness, so experiment to find yours.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Clear instructions for use. Cups easily hold extra large eggs that cook perfectly. During first use, we added eggs at slightly different times to determine appropriate cooking times. A great little experiment that helped us determine the ideal cooking time for us. Great pan with heat resistant handle. Glad we bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy cooking, difficult clearing.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pan & cover. Heats and cooks quickly. The individual egg holders make removing the egg difficult. Worse the are ridiculously difficult to clean. They must be scraped. Even if oil or butter is used before the egg is added.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS R RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product was a birthday gift and came missing 2 of the inserts . Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the money. Heavy duty pan and inserts. Eggs come out great. The only thing that's not heavy duty is the spatula which you don't need anyway. Spray the cups as directed and the eggs roll right out. Very happy with this purchase. Finally some really good eggs on toast.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poached eggs!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved poached eggs but have never figured out how to make them easily. It took me exactly 6 minutes to set up this pan and cook the eggs. They came out perfectly. So happy I bought this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Albo

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly poached
customer_reviews.text: Four minutes and the eggs are perfect. The cups are easy to clean, they need a spritz of Pam to prevent sticking. The tray edge could be a risk for a cut as some people have noted. I have not cut myself, I seem to get cut easy from other objects. I would buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Robmsn

customer_reviews.title: egg poacher
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice now and as I do love it I have one small issue. When trying to grab the egg cups to remove the poached egg safely, the handles could be longer as wearing a bulky oven mitt make s it difficult to grab the tiny handle. Otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: bbcm

customer_reviews.title: Great poacher pan
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic egg poacher pan. We have been searching for a good quality egg poacher. This one fits the bill Easy to use and the included mini spatula helps make the perfect display. The handle is covered so there is no heat on the hand. Glad we opted for this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C. Garieri

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I love poached eggs, HATE the gross water I have to deal with later. This eliminates the gross water. I’ve tried the little silicone cups and didn’t like them. I spray the cups with oil and the eggs slide right out. It’s an adjustment to figure out the cooking time, but this is finally a way to make poached eggs that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: We're loving the new egg poacher
customer_reviews.text: We have two other egg poachers, and they can't compare to this one. This one is a solid stainless steel pan, and heavy duty egg cups. It's too new to tell if the coating on the cups will hold up, but they are great now. The little handles on each cup help t=getting the eggs out. Definitely a great product!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Shattered glass lid
customer_reviews.text: Loved the poacher until over medium high heat the glass lid shattered. Clearly, I had the heat on too high. But the product came without any precautionary information, I had assumed that the air hole was added to prevent such an accident. Have not been able to find a way to contact the company in order to request a replacement. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Straight Life

customer_reviews.title: egg poacher
customer_reviews.text: this egg poacher is well made and easy to use, except one needs to spray the egg cups or the cooked eggs will stick. in addition the egg cup holders are hot and one needs a cloth or pot holder when removing the cooked eggs. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: NickAZ

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with my egg poacher!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my egg poacher I used it all the time easy and convenient plus your eggs look amazing I post a lot in social media and every time I post my poached eggs people is asking me about how I made them so perfect but it’s all because this wonderful product. It’s easy to use and easy to clean and storage highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: KMWeitzel

customer_reviews.title: It's the bees' knees!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had poached eggs in forever... had a hankering recently and chose this item. Packaged nicely, quality item. It comes with a little spatula kinda thing to easily pop the eggs out. We love this pan and are using it often. Give it a shot it's worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews ahead of buying the pan convinced me that this would be a good product. I was not disappointed. My only comment is that I was expecting a small size spatula to help remove the egg. Instead I received a normal sized one. The larger spatula makes egg removal a little bit harder but if you've sprayed the cup with a cooking spray, they will come out and make cleaning that much easier. I highly recommend this to those that like a correctly poached egg the same way every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Concerns with egg cups
customer_reviews.text: I love the pan, I would rate that 5, however I don't like the egg cups. The handle on the egg cup is a seperate piece screwed onto the cup and it never really was a tight hold. When using the handle, the cup would spin making it difficult to tip to get the egg onto the plate. After 2 or 3 uses, the handle is now stripped so the screw does not hold the cup and handle together, it just falls apart. I would have preferred to have the egg cup and handle to be a single unit, possibly all silicone??
customer_reviews.author: Jack G

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great on induction It was just a matter of getting the timing, right. My husband likes his eggs, very runny, and that's 4 minutes. I like my whites done. And a yellow runny and That is 6 minutes. I'd Buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I read the reviews, but I didn't have a problem with sharp edges. It works just as it states. My eggs turned out perfect from the first use. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Makes breakfast great again!
customer_reviews.text: Usually, "over light" is the way to go. But with this pan, it's easy to get exactly the right level of doneness without over-doing it. Nice quality, delivered fast. I will use this pan a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hrabik

customer_reviews.title: Egg holders are too small
customer_reviews.text: I am not that happy with this egg poacher. The egg holders are so small that I have almost avoided using it. If I had seen this in a store, I would not have purchased it. This is one of the bad things about purchasing items on line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poached eggs in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this egg poacher pan!! Easy and quick perfect for the price!! Comes with a little spatula as well. Use a little cooking spray in the individual poaching dishes makes easy to remove! Very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The egg poacher more than met my expectations. The pan is very heavy duty, more so than what I was expecting. It's very easy to clean, comes up to temperature quickly, eggs are easily removed without breakage and the price was great. I would highly recommend this pan to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda  Bemis

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice egg poacher but as another reviewer mentioned the disk that fits in the pan has very sharp edges so you will need to use some caution. Getting the egg cup out of the pan was a little difficult but not bad. Fairly easy to clean. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Eggs stick to cups without oil
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good product! We had no issues with sharp edges! The only caution I would say is the non stick cups need to be oiled prior to ALL uses!!! I sprayed a little oil on a paper towel and rubbed the cups the first few times I used them and then I skipped that step and the eggs stuck to the cups! They were hard to remove and the cups were even harder to get really clean!!! So, bottom line, if the cups are oiled EVERY time, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Pagosa customer

customer_reviews.title: I've looked long and hard for a method for getting the perfect poached egg
customer_reviews.text: First, I am in no way associated with the company. I bought this product online via Amazon after reviewing several similar pans. I've looked long and hard for a method for getting the perfect poached egg. This does the trick. Before, placing the egg in near-boiling water in a pan, or even using egg rings to hold the egg together, didn't work well. Plus it was hard to remove the eggs, even with a slotted spatula or spoon, without getting excess water on your plate. This pan made it simple and easy to get poached eggs the way I get them in restaurants. This is the only way I will poach eggs from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R. Spitz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product.  Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that the egg poacher was exactly as described. Excellent weight and quality. Egg cups were non-stick and easy to clean. My spouse and I are delighted with the poacher. Second, Levi and Hannah Levine of "Stock Your Home" who provided the poacher were delightful . We received an initial email with information about the product they were shipping to us and when it arrived, we had follow up contact to ensure that we were satisfied. Excellent service!!! M Hudson
customer_reviews.author: marvin j. hudson

customer_reviews.title: Good product that works
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I wanted. I have been looking for this pan for awhile and was happy when I found this one. It is easy to use and clean. It is just the right size for us.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Finally the perfect poached egg!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and the poached eggs are delicious! Eggs slide right out of the individual containers. Easy to clean Nd store.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - great quality
customer_reviews.text: It is really good. The depth of the egg cups is very deep and it's hard to cook the white with out causing the yolk to be too cooked. I would buy it again however.
customer_reviews.author: BleuHoney

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible returned product after 1st use. The stainless steel cake off during use and was worse once I washed it. Not good product at all. If I could give zero stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Not Non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Good quality heavy duty stainless steel pot however the egg cups are definitely not non-stick. The cups are some type of hard plastic with no non-stick coating. On my first use with no butter I had to scrape the eggs out. Now I have to use a pat of butter in each cup to get the eggs out. If the egg cups were non-stick I would have rated a 5 instead of a 2.
customer_reviews.author: Gander38

customer_reviews.title: Great poached eggs
customer_reviews.text: This pan is easy to use and makes very good poached eggs (as long as you follow the directions). The downside is that you have to be careful not to get a steam burn when you remove the cup(s) from pan after the egg(s) cooked. Also, one of my cups came with a cracked handle. It still works just fine, however.
customer_reviews.author: MarthaET

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Merchandise was much nicer than expected. Nice look and easy to use. This company cares about their products and goes to the point of contacting you to make sure you know all about the product. I would not hesitate to order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeynut

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Edges
customer_reviews.text: Good Poacher, Edges are very sharp under the holes for the poacher cup, be very careful when washing cut two fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Denny P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the overall appearance of this pan. There are 6 cups, one of which the knob is loose and no way to tighten, its kind of a pain when trying to pick it up to get an egg out. I sprayed each cup and the eggs just slid out. If all the knobs on the cups were tight this would be a 5 star review
customer_reviews.author: K. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great Egg Poacher
customer_reviews.text: Great egg poacher...has a fast cooking time for the eggs....easy to clean the egg trays. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Duffy

customer_reviews.title: The Worst product design on the planet.
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this piece of idiocy, should look for another line of work. Impossible to use. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome addition to our kitchen. It is easy to use and clean. We have poached eggs weekly.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So good I bought one for every female member of the family to poach eggs easily. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Chiefmoody

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I have ever purchased, as I cannot poach eggs if m6 life depended on it..they turn out great every time. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jill Konradt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Poached Eggs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this egg poaching set. I used it this morning and the eggs turned out perfect. The set is top quality stainless steel and the egg cups are non stick. It's easy now to make poached eggs. Dont hesitate on this, it's a good deal. I'm really impressed with the quality of this set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this product for the money. I'm sure it will be the last poached egg cooker I will ever buy. Remove the egg cups and it becomes a superior pan for any cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Mo S

customer_reviews.title: THANK GOD I found this
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE poached eggs but I don't like how much of a pain it is. This is super simple and fool proof.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice... produces great poached eggs
customer_reviews.text: This works fine for me. I put a little olive oil in ahead of the egg. It seems better if the water barely touches the bottom of the cup, that way the steam does most of the cooking. About the time all the water is boiled away is when the eggs are done the way I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Buff

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good egg poacher pan, and I’m happy with this one. It makes perfect poached eggs! Would recommend - easy to get the eggs out, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: The egg poaching pan I ordered exceeded my expectations!! An awesome little pan. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This just what I was looking for. Easy cleanup! Works as expected. I know some people complain about it having sharp edges when the wash it. I have not had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoya

customer_reviews.title: Worth More $$
customer_reviews.text: Can fit 2 eggs in each cup, but you must use a fat/oil/spray to prevent sticking. This is not a non-stick material. Very rugged. Don't use too much water and set heat low for perfection. Spoon works much better than included spatula for egg removal. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with this item. Sturdy and sleek at a good price. Lid and pan well made. Tip: Definitely use a non-stick spray on the cups before adding egg and use included spatula to remove egg. Otherwise, cleaning cup w/out an abrasive pad is a BITCH. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My husband makes poached eggs 3 out of 5 mornings. This has been a great purchase since there are three of us that love poached eggs. He can now make enough for all three instead of in small amounts waiting.
customer_reviews.author: MrsS

customer_reviews.title: No peeling anymore shells!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy, but I wished it had a recipe booklet to it. Also it is easy to burn yourself on the steam if you don't cover the holes on the top when removing the egg cups. I did not receive instructions in the box but they came on email and I cannot retrieve them. If someone can send more that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: D.  Hornsby

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully poached eggs
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of different poaching techniques which resulted in watery little blobs which sort of "floated" on my plate. This pan produces up to 4 perfectly beautiful little orbs of eggy deliciousness in four minutes. It also only requires an inch of water in the pan, which means it comes to a simmer so much faster than techniques which require a large pan of water for the eggs to float in. A tiny amount of cooking spray or vegetable oil and the eggs slide effortlessly out of the little cups.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Aberson

customer_reviews.title: Took me a couple of tries to get the timing right for perfect eggs
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews ahead of my purchase, so I already knew the insert could be sharp around the edges. However, I have had no problems with safety. Eggs are easy to remove, I don't even have to use the spatula, they just slide right out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the cook who is too lazy to learn how to poach an egg
customer_reviews.text: I'm beginning to think it's easier to poach an egg in simmering water (and you should NEVER use vinegar; if you do, you're doing it wrong).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Great poached eggs
customer_reviews.text: I love poached eggs and with this pan they are so easy to make. I bought one for my boyfriends house also.
customer_reviews.author: carrie clausen

customer_reviews.title: Really haapy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Had the larger pan from the same brand but just wanted one with less cups to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: use every day
customer_reviews.text: with a lot of choices wasn't sure if this was a good pick. but turns out it was. makes great poached eggs.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this! She said it cooks her poached eggs perfectly & is the best egg poacher she's ever used! She's referring this pan to everyone she knows! LOL Happy wife, happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Tornes

customer_reviews.title: Good product but can't get replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I use this poacher all the time and am happy with the way it works and how it cooks the eggs. However, I had a handle break off one of the cups. I contacted the company to ask about replacement parts, but they ignored my inquiry. Generally I only cook two eggs at a time, so I have an extra cup, but if those start breaking, I am left with a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It performs beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product and it arrived on time. It was a gift and the recipient loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie C.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This is a keeper. It works very well. The non stick surface in the cups is nice and works well. I gave it a 3 on durability because there is no way that I have any idea how long it will last since I just bought it.
customer_reviews.author: David Killeen

product_meta.title: Egg Poacher Pan - Stainless Steel Poached Egg Cooker – Perfect Poached Egg Maker – Induction Cooktop Egg Poachers Cookware Set with 4 Large Egg Poacher Cups and Silicone Spatula
feature_bullets: ★ PERFECT EGG POACHER: This 4-cup egg poacher set comes equipped with a durable 10-inch 18/8 stainless steel pan, tempered glass lid, removable tray, four non-stick Teflon-coated egg cups, and a silicone spatula to poach your eggs to perfection. Each egg poacher cup can hold up to one large egg.

★ STRONG & DEPENDABLE: Large and sturdy, the stainless steel pan allows the eggs to cook in 2 cups of water, while steam passes through the small holes in the insert. The see-through glass cover makes it easy to keep track of your eggs. The stay-cool handle prevents overheating and allows gripping without any pain or hassle!

★ MAKE EGG-CELLENT DISHES: Cook a delicious breakfast or brunch or get creative with egg-inspired dinner dishes. All four of the Teflon cups are deep enough to be used like miniature sauté pans allowing you to prepare custom egg creations for you and your family, seasoned to your liking.

★ GREAT PAN FOR EVERYDAY USE: Once you’re done poaching your eggs, you can remove the insert and use pan for all your other cooking needs. Product Dimensions: Approx. 4” tall with lid on, 8” diameter across the bottom of pan, and 7” handle.
★ SCOOP & CLEAN WITH EASE: The silicone spatula makes egg removal quick and easy. Order your egg poacher set today!
